kv7.1:1.1: ☑ Natthi keci dhammā kehici dhammehi saṅgahitāti?
kv7.1:1.3: Nanu atthi keci dhammā kehici dhammehi gaṇanaṃ gacchanti uddesaṃ gacchanti pariyāpannāti?
kv7.1:1.5: Hañci atthi keci dhammā kehici dhammehi gaṇanaṃ gacchanti uddesaṃ gacchanti pariyāpannā, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv7.1:2.3: Hañci cakkhāyatanaṃ rūpakkhandhagaṇanaṃ gacchati, tena vata re vattabbe—
kv7.1:2.10: Hañci kāyāyatanaṃ rūpakkhandhagaṇanaṃ gacchati, tena vata re vattabbe—
kv7.1:3.7: Hañci phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ rūpakkhandhagaṇanaṃ gacchati, tena vata re vattabbe—
kv7.1:4.3: Hañci sukhā vedanā vedanākkhandhagaṇanaṃ gacchati, tena vata re vattabbe—
kv7.1:4.5: Dukkhā vedanā …pe… adukkhamasukhā vedanā katamakkhandhagaṇanaṃ gacchatīti?
kv7.1:4.7: Hañci adukkhamasukhā vedanā vedanākkhandhagaṇanaṃ gacchati, tena vata re vattabbe—
kv7.1:5.3: Hañci cakkhusamphassajā saññā saññākkhandhagaṇanaṃ gacchati, tena vata re vattabbe—
kv7.1:5.8: Hañci manosamphassajā saññā saññākkhandhagaṇanaṃ gacchati, tena vata re vattabbe—
kv7.1:6.4: Hañci manosamphassajā cetanā saṅkhārakkhandhagaṇanaṃ gacchati, tena vata re vattabbe—
kv7.1:7.4: Hañci manoviññāṇaṃ viññāṇakkhandhagaṇanaṃ gacchati, tena vata re vattabbe—
kv7.1:8.1: ☒ Yathā dāmena vā yottena vā dve balībaddā saṅgahitā, sikkāya piṇḍapāto saṅgahito, sā gaddulena saṅgahito;
kv7.1:8.2: evameva te dhammā tehi dhammehi saṅgahitāti?
kv7.1:8.3: Hañci dāmena vā yottena vā dve balībaddā saṅgahitā, sikkāya piṇḍapāto saṅgahito, sā gaddulena saṅgahito, tena vata re vattabbe—
